WeaponTraitDef.label: quick magazine
WeaponTraitDef.description: Designed with an improved release mechanism, this magazine makes the reloading process quicker, helping to reduce downtime during a firefight.

WeaponTraitDef.label: extended magazine
WeaponTraitDef.description: This magazine holds more ammunition than the standard version, allowing the weapon to fire more shots in a single burst.

WeaponTraitDef.label: belt magazine
WeaponTraitDef.description: This belt-feeding mechanism provides a continuous stream of ammunition, enabling the weapon to unleash a significantly longer and more suppressive burst of fire.

WeaponTraitDef.label: drum magazine
WeaponTraitDef.description: This high-capacity drum magazine holds a substantial number of rounds, enabling the weapon to deliver a prolonged and overwhelming burst of fire.
